projects.name: EtherEstate - Ethereum-based Real Estate Platform
projects.description: A blockchain-based DApp that revolutionizes real estate transactions using Ethereum smart contracts. This platform eliminates intermediaries, reduces costs, and increases transparency in property deals. Users can list properties, make offers, and complete transactions entirely on-chain with automatic escrow and title transfer functionality.
projects.technologies: React, Tailwind CSS, Solidity, Hardhat, Ethers.js, IPFS for property documents

projects.name: PawFund - Decentralized Crowdfunding Platform
projects.description: PawFund is a decentralized crowdfunding platform for animal rescue, connecting donors with urgent cases through blockchain technology. Create campaigns, contribute ETH, and track your impact in real-time.
projects.technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, Solidity, Hardhat, Ethers.js, Web3
